  when cb first came out in 1958, the fathers of two of my buddies got one.  2 tubes no crystals.
   
  mr rachielles weaped a few turns of wire around the smaller tube and put one lead on the roof and the other to the lightning rod ground.  the sun was super active
   
  effect was something like linked all-wave receiver
